sense.gloss: Altair (star in the constellation Aquila), Alpha Aquilae
echo (esp. one reverberating in the mountains)
Nagasunehiko, legendary clan leader who opposed Emperor Jimmu's unification of Japan and was subsequently killed by the deity Nigihayahi

sdata.j: ↑高田↑↓たかだ↓↑信彦↑↓のぶひこ↓はヒクソン・グレイシーに↑負↑↓ま↓けました。
sdata.e: Nobuhiko Takada lost to Hikson Grasy.

sdata.j: ↑邦彦↑↓くにひこ↓は↑最初↑↓さいしょ↓の↑一↑↓いち↓↑発↑↓はつ↓で↑的↑↓まと↓を↑撃↑↓う↓ち↑当↑↓あ↓てた。
sdata.e: Kunihiko hit the target with his first shot.

sdata.j: 「うちのかわいい↑冬↑↓ふゆ↓↑彦↑↓ひこ↓ちゃんを、あんなろくに↑挨拶↑↓あいさつ↓もできないよう↑小娘↑↓こむすめ↓と↑結婚↑↓けっこん↓させれるわけないでしょ。あなたから、はっきり↑言↑↓い↓ってやってください」「そうだな。まぁ、いいんじゃないか？かわいいし」「いくありません。↑顔↑↓かお↓は↑関係↑↓かんけい↓ありません」「まぁ、そんなかっかするな。お↑前↑↓まえ↓だって、↑昔↑↓むかし↓は↑毎晩↑↓まいばん↓のようにディスコに↑行↑↓い↓ってブイブイ↑言↑↓い↓わしてたんだし」「それとこれとは↑別↑↓べつ↓です」「↑同↑↓おな↓じだよ。↑馬鹿馬鹿↑↓ばかばか↓しい。↑早↑↓はや↓く、↑子離↑↓こばな↓れしろ」
sdata.e: I'm not going to let my sweet Fuyuhiko get married to a little girl who doesn't even have basic manners. Tell him that for me. "It's not so bad. I mean, she's cute." "No, she's not. And looks don't matter." "Well, don't get all worked up about it. You used to go to the disco every night and live it up, partying hard." "That's different." "It's the same thing! This is ridiculous. You need to learn to let things go."

words.gloss: Altair (star in the constellation Aquila), Alpha Aquilae
